sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Doughnut } from 'react-chartjs-2'; const data = (totalPossible, percent) => ({ datasets: [{ data: [totalPossible, totalPossible-percent], backgroundColor: [ '#ce237a', 'rgb(234, 234, 234)', ], }], }) // TODO: Implement doughnut charts const CourseProgress = ({ state: { startDate, testDate, progress, improvement, lessons, instruction, practiceTests }, active }) => (

Course Progress

Start Date {startDate}
Test Date Oct SAT ({testDate})
Once the course begins, check here to be sure the student is on track.
{active && {progress}%}
data(100, 82)} width={156} height={156} options={{ cutoutPercentage: 80, }} />
Improvement {improvement}% vs target score None Yet
Lessons {lessons}% vs scheduled lessons None Scheduled
Instruction {instruction}% vs scheduled instruction None Scheduled
Practice Tests {practiceTests}% vs scheduled tests None Scheduled
Complete
Behind Schedule
); CourseProgress.propTypes = { state: PropTypes.object.isRequired, active: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, }; export default CourseProgress;
